description:
😱 All new look! Themes! Pebble 2 and heart rate support!
This is Weathergraph's biggest update ever :)
Also, seconds.

Beautiful yet functional weather forecast watchface with a hour-by-hour level of detail that far surpasses anything else in Pebble Store.

WeatherGraph shows:
❤️ daily steps and distance - toggle HR/steps/kilometers/miles (heart rate only on Pebble 2) *NEW
🌡 hour-by-hour temperature (chart at the bottom)
🌧 hour-by-hour precipitation - rain and snow (bars at the bottom + rain/snow pattern from clouds)
☁️ hour-by-hour ☁️ cloudiness (cloud cover) and ☀️ sunshine (clouds on top + sun rays)
🌤 daily minimum and maximum (overlaid above chart)
❄️ actual temperature and place (on the bottom)
👟 daily step count from Pebble Health (on the bottom, if Health is enabled)
📅  date and day of month
☀️ batery and bluetooth indicator
🕐 configurable 1/2/3/5 day chart

All of that in an elegant visualisation.

Weathergraph is rated with 'A' battery rating from Pebble team, which means it has almost no impact on your battery life :).

Ideas? Problems? Write at facebook.com/weathergraph or to support email. Thanks!

Made in Prague.
